entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Ucluelet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
